Note that the indoor pool area of 1250 sq.ft. is not included in MLS square footage and the pool size is 16'10 x 36'9. Down is large changing room with sauna and shower area, office and attached garage. Loads of storage. Both fireplaces have gas starters. Wonderfully private location. This elegant home has porte cochere plus lots of area for guest parking. Very open and well executed floor plan.
Realtor Remarks: Square footage and room sizes approximate -buyer to verify if important. Connected to City sewer.

Public Remarks: Trophy property - first time on the market in over 40 years. A stunning 27,000 sq. ft. lot perched on the high side of the 700 block Eyremount with sweeping views of downtown and beyond. Classic and solid 1961 post and beam with a rare combination of privacy and views. Nestled among signature estates and ready to renovate, hold, or redevelop.
Realtor Remarks: As per schedule A -offers if any to be presented 1pm February 6th 2015. Lot size taken from Tax Report. Buyer responsible to confirm all measurements. Photos and floor plan at www.lancephillips.com. First showings February 5th. Do not walk the property without appt.
All measurements are approximate, Buyer to verify. Please visit Web Site www.carolinehong.com for photos.

Public Remarks: Custom built R-2000 energy-efficient home on prestigious University Endowment Lands! A rare available freehold property with beautiful yard backing onto greenbelt. This 2002 Georgie Sustainability Award winning property was designed & built by Wisa Healthy Homes, winner of multiple Georgie Awards. Featuring 10 ft ceiling on main, 9 ft ceiling upper with vault, 6 ensuited bedrooms, decent office & in-law suite on main, space for elevator, ground source heat pump, tons of high standard building details and 4-car detached garage with green house. A 3D upgrade design plan is available with estimates for a better kitchen plus a wok kitchen, a nicer dining room and a larger rec room. A precious gem, don't miss it!!!
Realtor Remarks: Measurements to be verified by Buyer.

Public Remarks: Stunning contemporary masterpiece in the heart of Shaughnessy. Finely crafted home with an interior design 2nd to none. Architecturally designed by world renowned IBI Group interior designed by award winning Juli Hodgson Design. This 6 bedroom home of over 5000 square feet is an entertainers dream but also works extremely well for family living. Summer living will never be the same with a spectacular outdoor pool, hot tub and cabana. Incredibly private yet bright home and property. A rare find indeed.
Realtor Remarks: School Catchment: Quilchena Elementary, Point Grey Secondary. Below Main sq ft is cabana.
